channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 世贸组织部长级会议：阿布扎比会议的关键问题
item.description: Ministers from across the globe are convening at the World Trade Organization (WTO) Ministerial Conference in Abu Dhabi from Feb. 26-29 to try to set new rules for global commerce, including reforming its dispute system and cutting fishing subsidies.翻译:来自世界各地的部长将于 2 月 26 日至 29 日在阿布扎比召开世界贸易组织 (WTO) 部长级会议，试图为全球商业制定新规则，包括改革争端制度和削减渔业补贴。
item.author: Emma Farge, Rachna Uppal

item.title: 中国称地方政府必须防止房地产市场波动
item.description: Local governments in China should help balance supply and demand in the real estate market, China's Ministry of Housing and Urban and Rural Development said on its website on Tuesday.翻译:中国住房和城乡建设部周二在其网站上表示，中国地方政府应帮助平衡房地产市场的供需。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，越南从印度进口糙米用于再出口
item.description: Vietnam has imported husked brown rice from India for the first time in decades to process the grain and export the refined, white variety, trade and government sources said, as Hanoi tries to cash in on strong global demand for the staple.翻译:贸易和政府消息人士称，越南几十年来首次从印度进口糙米，用于加工谷物并出口精制白米，河内试图利用全球对糙米的强劲需求获利。
item.author: Rajendra Jadhav

item.title: 彪马旨在在“充满挑战”的市场中提升其品牌
item.description: Puma expects a weak first half of the year in a challenging market, the German sportswear brand said on Tuesday, but its shares rose slightly as it stuck to annual targets set in January and announced a new campaign to boost its brand.翻译:德国运动服装品牌彪马周二表示，预计今年上半年在充满挑战的市场中将表现疲软，但其股价小幅上涨，因为该公司坚持一月份设定的年度目标，并宣布了一项新的品牌宣传活动。
item.author: Alexander Hübner, Helen Reid

item.title: 尽管受到渥太华的审查，中国资金仍在追逐加拿大的重要矿业交易
item.description: A year after Canada tightened foreign investment rules for the critical minerals sector, Chinese money has continued to pour into Toronto-listed miners, according to proprietary research conducted by the University of Alberta.翻译:根据阿尔伯塔大学进行的专有研究，加拿大收紧关键矿产行业的外国投资规则一年后，中国资金继续涌入多伦多上市的矿业公司。
item.author: Divya Rajagopal

item.title: 早盘竞价：中东关注，焦虑的债券受到竞价
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 研究显示，由于欧洲投资担忧，中国收购量下降
item.description: China's economic challenges paired with wariness towards Chinese investment in Europe contributed to a decline in the number of takeovers by Chinese buyers on the continent last year, according to a study by auditing and consulting company EY.翻译:审计和咨询公司安永的一项研究显示，中国面临的经济挑战，加上对中国在欧洲投资的谨慎态度，导致去年中国买家在欧洲大陆的收购数量下降。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 印度动力煤进口量自大流行以来首次下降
item.description: India's thermal coal imports are expected to fall for the first time this year since the COVID-19 pandemic due to increasing domestic output and record high inventories, industry officials said on Tuesday.翻译:行业官员周二表示，由于国内产量增加和库存创历史新高，预计今年印度动力煤进口量将出现自 COVID-19 大流行以来的首次下降。
item.author: Sethuraman R, Brijesh Patel

item.title: 阿里巴巴旗下南亚电商巨头Daraz在备忘录中宣布裁员
item.description: Alibaba-owned e-commerce platform Daraz Group has announced layoffs across the group to "adopt a more streamlined and agile structure", acting Chief Executive Officer James Dong said on Tuesday in an internal memo to employees reviewed by Reuters.翻译:阿里巴巴旗下的电子商务平台 Daraz Group 代理首席执行官 James Dong 周二在路透社看到的一份致员工的内部备忘录中表示，该公司已宣布在整个集团进行裁员，以“采用更加精简和灵活的结构”。
item.author: Ariba Shahid

item.title: 牙科种植体制造商士卓曼对 2024 年持谨慎态度，押注中国增长
item.description: Swiss dental implant maker Straumann on Tuesday forecast steady 2024 sales growth, taking a cautious stance amidst prolonged economic uncertainty.翻译:瑞士种植牙制造商士卓曼 (Straumann) 周二预测 2024 年销售额将稳定增长，在长期的经济不确定性中采取谨慎立场。
item.author: Andrey Sychev, Marleen Kaesebier

item.title: 随着中国出货量激增，印度四月至一月钢铁进口量创六年新高
item.description: India's steel imports touched a six-year high in the first 10 months of the fiscal year to March, led by Chinese shipments, and India was a net importer of finished steel, according to provisional government data seen by Reuters on Tuesday.翻译:路透社周二看到的临时政府数据显示，在中国出货量的带动下，印度钢铁进口量在截至3月份的本财年前10个月触及六年来新高，并且印度是成品钢材的净进口国。
item.author: Neha Arora

item.title: 澳大利亚贸易部长表示，中国葡萄酒争端可能在几周内得到解决
item.description: A trade dispute with China over tariffs on Australian wine may be resolved "in a few weeks' time", Australian Trade Minister Don Farrell said on Tuesday, removing one of the final obstacles curbing its exports to China.翻译:澳大利亚贸易部长唐·法雷尔周二表示，与中国有关澳大利亚葡萄酒关税的贸易争端可能“在几周内”得到解决，从而消除了限制其对华出口的最后障碍之一。
item.author: Alasdair Pal

item.title: 越南计划进行工会改革以避免贸易困境，但冒着外国公司不安的风险
item.description: Communist-ruled Vietnam is expected to ratify this year the UN convention for the free establishment of trade unions, UN officials and diplomats said, in a move meant to cut risks of trade disputes but likely leaving some foreign companies uneasy.翻译:联合国官员和外交官表示，共产党统治下的越南预计将在今年批准联合国自由建立工会公约，此举旨在降低贸易争端风险，但可能会让一些外国公司感到不安。
item.author: Francesco Guarascio

item.title: 中国商飞将在东南亚5国展示C919、ARJ21飞机
item.description: Chinese state-owned planemaker COMAC will conduct flying displays of its C919 and ARJ21 jets in five Southeast Asian countries, it said on Tuesday, as it looks to lay the groundwork for future international sales.翻译:中国国有飞机制造商中国商飞公司周二表示，将在五个东南亚国家进行C919和ARJ21喷气式飞机的飞行展示​​，为未来的国际销售奠定基础。
item.author: Sophie Yu, Brenda Goh

item.title: 独家：渣打银行暂停中国客户新的离岸渠道投资
item.description: Standard Chartered has suspended new investments by its clients in China into offshore products via a quota-based channel, the bank said, amid a surge in demand for overseas investments due to weakness in the local market and currency.翻译:渣打银行表示，由于当地市场和货币疲软，海外投资需求激增，该行已暂停中国客户通过配额渠道对离岸产品进行新投资。
item.author: Selena Li

item.title: 日本股市飙升让投资者远离陷入困境的中国
item.description: As economic and geopolitical woes spur an exodus of investors from China, many have been redirecting money into Japan, giving the benchmark Nikkei an extra boost as it rockets to all-time highs.翻译:随着经济和地缘政治困境促使投资者大量逃离中国，许多人将资金转移到日本，这给基准日经指数带来了额外的提振，使其飙升至历史新高。
item.author: Brigid Riley

item.title: 世界股市徘徊在历史高位下方，收益率稳定
item.description: European stock indexes struggled for direction on Tuesday and Wall Street futures saw small gains, as the equity rally slowed and investors weighed up the outlook for central bank rate cuts, ahead of key inflation data later in the week.翻译:欧洲股指周二苦苦寻找方向，华尔街期货小幅上涨，原因是股市涨势放缓，投资者在本周晚些时候发布关键通胀数据之前权衡央行降息前景。
item.author: Elizabeth Howcroft

item.title: 台湾称5艘中国海警船进入前线岛屿附近海域
item.description: Five Chinese coast guard ships entered prohibited or restricted waters around Taiwan's frontline islands of Kinmen on Monday but left shortly after being warned away, a Taiwan minister said on Tuesday amid a continued rise in tensions with Beijing.翻译:台湾一位部长周二表示，在与北京的紧张关系持续升级之际，五艘中国海警船周一进入台湾前线金门岛周围的禁区或限制水域，但在被警告离开后不久就离开了。
item.author: Ben Blanchard, Yimou Lee

item.title: 经济数据公布前美元小幅走低，日元上涨
item.description: The dollar struggled for direction on Tuesday ahead of key data that could provide further clues about the U.S. Federal Reserve's policy path, while the yen rose after figures confirmed inflation was above the Bank of Japan's (BOJ) target.翻译:周二，在可能为美联储政策路径提供进一步线索的关键数据公布之前，美元努力寻找方向，而在数据确认通胀高于日本央行(BOJ)目标后，日元上涨。
item.author: Stefano Rebaudo

item.title: 夏威夷邻国基里巴斯发现中国警察后美国发出警告
item.description: The United States on Monday cautioned Pacific Islands nations against assistance from Chinese security forces after Reuters reported that Chinese police are working in the remote atoll nation of Kiribati, a neighbor of Hawaii.翻译:在路透社报道中国警察正在夏威夷邻国基里巴斯偏远环礁国家工作后，美国周一警告太平洋岛国不要接受中国安全部队的援助。
item.author: David Brunnstrom, Kirsty Needham
